name: The Deaths of the Blessed Ugoccione and Sostegno (recto); A Study of the Farnese Hercules (verso)
description: The Deaths of the Blessed Ugoccione and Sostegno (recto); A Study of the Farnese Hercules (verso); Bernardino Poccetti (Barbatelli) (Italian, 1548 - 1612); Italy; about 1604 - 1612; Black chalk, brush and brown ink and brown wash heightened with white gouache, squared in red chalk (recto); Pen and brown ink (verso); 27.6 x 41.8 cm (10 7/8 x 16 7/16 in.); 85.GG.223; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Deaths of the Blessed Ugoccione and Sostegno (recto); A Study of the Farnese Hercules (verso)
medium: Black chalk, brush and brown ink and brown wash heightened with white gouache, squared in red chalk (recto); Pen and brown ink (verso)
